text:
[Verse]
Lights flash on the road
Speeding fast nowhere to go
Music loud let's take a ride
Midnight drive under the sky

[Chorus]
Stars above city lights
Feel the wind free tonight
Midnight drive all you need
Heartbeats racing feel the speed

[Verse 2]
Windows down hair in breeze
City's asleep we're at ease
Radio plays our favorite tune
Midnight magic under the moon

[Chorus]
Stars above city lights
Feel the wind free tonight
Midnight drive all you need
Heartbeats racing feel the speed

[Bridge]
Don't need a map we'll find our way
You and me we'll seize the day
Night is ours no looking back
On this midnight thrill-packed track

[Chorus]
Stars above city lights
Feel the wind free tonight
Midnight drive all you need
Heartbeats racing feel the speed
title: Midnight Drive
